QuestData.Title: A New Enemy
QuestData.Description: The horde is using dark magic to control beasts and corrupt their brethren down here, $n.$b$bI intend to put a stop to it, but first I need to know what it is we're fighting against. That's where you come in.$b$bFight through the caverns and collect the insignia that the cultists carry. With them, I can study what type of magic is at work here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Corrupted Insignia from the Dark Shaman cultists.
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $n. Now we can figure out what it is they were trying to achieve down here.
